mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_id,c.comment_id,c.content, rcontent,r.create_time,r.state, r.parent_id,u.user_name,u.user_img FROM tb_comment_reply r, tb_user u, tb_movie_comment c WHERE r.parent_id=#{userId} AND r.user_id=u.user_id AND c.comment_id=r.comment_id AND r.state=0
